website_summaries.verdict: Keeps ash and cigarette butts contained. Easy to operate ashtray; push the plunger and your butts will disappear inside.
pros: This large 5-inch diameter ashtray is suitable for outdoor use
Its generous size helps keep butts inside the tray, where they belong
The design helps eliminate that ashtray smell
cons: The metal is quite thin and will dent if dropped

customer_reviews.title: Add an inch or two of baking soda and you are ready to go.
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described (I bought another one) and helps a lot with those pesky and nasty ashes. I also add a layer of baking soda in the bottom to hopefully absorb some of the smell. Writing this I realize I need to quit...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get... works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. Things I’ve learned include adding a drop of oil on the spring mechanism, before using and on occasion. Also, chose to spray the tray with additional coat of Rustoleum for to battle the weather elements and color preference. If you want it to last longer, keep it out of the rain. Great product with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Swing and a Miss..
customer_reviews.text: Ashes everywhere. The push down is very stiff and a novel idea, however it gets stuck in the down position and you have to manually pull it up. Not sure about you but I do not want that kind of interaction with an ash tray. The ash tray is also so shallow that ashes go all over the place. I finally found a 3 pack of the good old fashioned black bar ash trays that are tried and true. Do yourself a favor and stick with conventional ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jospeh Malandrone

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my spouse or me really:) he smokes in bed and was constantly dumping the ashtray everytime he moved. Our comforter was a mess. This is great no more ashes on the bed. I bought a new comforter and there he flipped this ashtray completely over. No ashes came out.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor ashtrays
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific. Cleaning tip - use dry paper towel to clean them initially, that will remove most of the stuck on ash residue. Then soak in warm water for a few hours, and wipe clean. You can also use WD-40 on the central mechanism to help it move like it did when it was new. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: ProfDave

customer_reviews.title: Best Ashtray for Outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is perfect for outdoors. I live in an apartment complex, and I'm allowed to leave this outside by our door because it really locks in the smell of used cigarettes. It's much easier than making a trip to the trash can outside every time I smoke. It's also really fun to push down the top and watch your cigarette butt spin into the tray! It holds a LOT too, so you don't have to empty it very often (depending on how much you smoke, I suppose). All of my friends want one!
customer_reviews.author: VF

customer_reviews.title: It holds the mess
customer_reviews.text: I have family members that still smoke. I bought this because our smoking area is on the back patio and this way I don't have to worry about emptying the butts before they blow into the pool. This is perfect. Plus, it's a vintage piece. I remember these back in the '60s in places like gas stations and stuff. Kind of brings back memories of dingy gas station waiting rooms while the old station wagon was getting the oil changed. Dad would sometimes take us kids to get us out of the house and out from under Mom's feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: Really works good.
customer_reviews.text: I've got one of these in the man cave(garage) and that's where we hang out when we have company. Whenever one of my guest mentions the ash tray and tell me how good it works and how neat it is - I reach up on the cabinet and hand them a brand new one in the box! They love it - getting an unexpected gift they like. This thing holds a lot of butts and is easy to use. It also keeps the smoke contained when you put one out. Highly recommend this ash tray - it will get a lot of attention from quests.
customer_reviews.author: Locke

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these ashtrays I've purchased. They are perfect for my sunroom and patio. Because of the lid/spin feature they prevent ashes being blown onto the table top, and extinguish cigarettes that are not all the way put out. While I am not one to let my ashtray to fill up, it is nice that they hold quite a few cigarette butts, completely out of sight, which allows you to not feel that you constantly need to empty an ashtray when you have company over who is smoking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this ashtray will be ordering more I had one similar but it was too small and the cig butts always got stuck in the spinner this one is large enough you can lay your burning cig butt on the plate and press the button it sweeps it into the ashtray and extinguishes by smothering keeps the smell down and no worries of a cherry burning in an ashtray after putting one out
customer_reviews.author: Josh b.

customer_reviews.title: How to RENT an ashtray
customer_reviews.text: It was cool. It worked a few weeks. Then it jammed. Not the turning part; the bowl and the lid. We can’t get it open without it possibly never working again, so tossing out the whole thing seems more likely once we find a replacement. I know there’s ‘you get what you pay for’, but I wasn’t trying to rent the use of an ashtray. I wanted its use for more than one month.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past!
customer_reviews.text: I like this ashtray! Just keep it clean and it'll work fine for a long time. We smoke in our boat barn and this little old school ashtray works great. No more butts on the ground and ashtray fires. Easy five stars! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: The cleanest looking ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: It is so simple and genius! I really appreciate how clean it looks vs an open ashtray. Easy to empty and fun to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Chirinium

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but doesn't spin as well after leaving outside during a few rainy days. Easy to clean and better to look at than an ashtray full of cigarette butts. It was a gift for my mom and she loves it. My brother has multiple of these and they all work great. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Totally bummed!
customer_reviews.text: Received this ashtray on August 27, 2018. Worked great, cigarettes went out when pushed down, liked the unlit of the product. Chrome wasn’t marring. All is good. Then October 1, 2018 ashtray breaks. Tried cleaning the push down rod, sprayed it with silicone to try to get it to come back up; nothing worked. So I’m going to order another one and hope that they will see this and reach out.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lawing

customer_reviews.title: not like the others I bought
customer_reviews.text: I like the 5 inch size like I usually get but this one has a top that comes off too easy so when I grab it to move it, I have to grab from the bottom so it doesn't just fall out of it's top. Other ones I bought before are tight enough to move around without worry but easy to empty. I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I member these back in the day my grandparents used to have one. Helps keep your room from smelling like a big butt, has a capacity for a pack maybe 2, but not overly big. I remember sometimes you would get a nasty smouldering fire inside if you don't empty it out enough, so far that hasn't happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Contains the smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ashtray!! You just leave your cig on top and push the black top and it spins and puts your cig in the container and it’s sealed so there is no need to put it out first! Best part it contains the smell!!! Eazy to open and empty and wash also!
customer_reviews.author: Herbgirl

customer_reviews.title: It's big, the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these for 15 years and it finally broke down. I wanted another one and I saw many choices on Amazon, but this one was larger than some, and appeared to be built well. I wasnt disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WV Radio Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this ashtray. Cigarettes will not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this ashtray. Cigarettes will not stay lit if you rest it for more than a few seconds, and it's very shallow if you place the cigarette where it's supposed to go. 1 star for the ability to keep butts out of sight
customer_reviews.author: DRAGONFYRE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, exactly as described, and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good ashtray...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very decent ashtray for the price. I did what I read in other reviews and put some WD40 on the pieces that move to make the ashes go down. It def helps to spin smoother. I also put baking soda in the bottom. It will hold a lot of butts before you need to empty it. My only complaint is that if you want to set a cigarette down there's not really room to unless the cigarette is almost done anyway. I have to try and balance it across the 3 "bars" in the middle..but it's not that big of an issue so overall I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an ash tray for my son, preferably one with a lid to keep the odor of the cigarette ashes confined. Then I found what I was looking for, this table top ash tray with push down lid and spinning tray was perfect, as well as inexpensive. I was surprised how quickly it came. My son loves it, and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Monica E. Ladislaw

customer_reviews.title: Huge ashtray
customer_reviews.text: I love these ashtrays as I already have a smaller one which is perfect. I received this one which is huge and I love that! But it doesn’t twist and lock on like my smaller one and if it gets knocked over the lid will fall off and cause a mess of course! Kind of disappointed. Wish the lid would lock. Idk if mine is defective or what
customer_reviews.author: Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray.. Not long lasting though
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray but after a few months in the rain it didn't work so well. But I just ordered my second one because I love it. Update, on my third one for the year. Wished they would last
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: All ashtrays are kind of gross, but this one isn't so bad!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to keep clean, keeps your smoking spot tidy, and just in general is a cool ashtray. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: Round push down ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Not to thrilled with these ashtrays. When you press down on the lever it takes time to come back up. When it does come back up it snaps shut and any remaining ashes are sent flying. But it serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk.
customer_reviews.text: This ashray is a piece of junk. I ordered one a few years back that was really nice, but when it wore out I ordered a replacement and it is not of the same quality. The first replacement came broken and I had to return. The next one seemed OK when I received it but it only lasted a couple of months before it fell apart and there was no way to get it back together. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Paula Yamashiro

customer_reviews.title: If you want to hide those butts and don't want to smell ashes ............. THIS is the ashtray you need !
customer_reviews.text: If you want an ashtray on your desk or outside patio and don't want to see or smell cigarette butts and ashes, this is the one. It is very well made and larger that it looks in the picture, which is a good thing. As well, easy to empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J McConnell

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a smoker. Got him this as a gift for Christmas. He loves it and it looks very nice as compared to a regular ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Bindu Erica

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like it
customer_reviews.text: You can’t rest your cigarette on it. Very hard to get top off to clean. Bought an old time one at Dollar tree
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like people smoking in my house
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like people smoking in my house, even as a smoker myself, but there is a single room upstairs my husband will smoke in and this definitely keeps the smell down. Perfect gift for a smoker who doesn’t always want to go outside in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cigar sized ash tray is cheap material for the top part that spins. It gets stuck easily while spinning. Other than that it is good for the price and great for a party or something where it might get broken by people.
customer_reviews.author: The McKs

customer_reviews.title: Traps smoke odor
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keeps butts contained and prevents bad smoke smell from lingering after you extinguish
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best ash tray ever !!
customer_reviews.text: Great value ! was kinda confused as to how to use it but once we figured that out we don’t know how we did without one ! Doesn’t leave our garage smelling like cigarettes. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Super Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We first encountered these on a cruise, and since it's very windy at our house, we thought they would be a great idea. One of them still is going strong and we love it. Unfortunately, one of them broke within a couple of months after we received it. I wrote to the company explaining the problem and asked for a parts list. Instead, they offered to replace it. GREAT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E Nolan

customer_reviews.title: A cheap product!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived bent, even though the package box was not damaged. A cheap product!
customer_reviews.author: Fish Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Great product - love that keeps ashes from getting all over
customer_reviews.text: Great product - love that keeps ashes from getting all over - not the smoker - but keep as a courtesy for others - simple to operate - easy to clean - bought more really like this product
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Matz

customer_reviews.title: Ashtray is great! When I first received it
customer_reviews.text: Ashtray is great! When I first received it, I thought it was going to be actual metal, but it's painted plastic. The gadget used to push down and spin the ashes and cigarettes into the bottom is actually very cool. We'll see how it holds up. Would definitely recommend this to others interested!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 5 stars!! Everything arrived perfect just as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: King Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my screened porch and I love it. It is such a great design. You push down on the knob and the ashes swirl into the container below as well as the butt when you are done! No wind problems and no dirty ashtray to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Varn

customer_reviews.title: cheap ash trays
customer_reviews.text: the ash tray is to light,the hole ash tray turns wen uoy spin the lid
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: When you push down most of the ashes fly instead of going down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with this ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ashtray. It’s bigger than I expected which is great. I like to press the knob down and watch it spin & all of the ashes & the cigarette butt fall into the bottom part. When it closes back up it seals out the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Man cave ash tray
customer_reviews.text: Good for man cave. Easy to clean and no smell. Would buy from seller again
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to ash trays
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design for butts. Keep it on the back deck and does not leave any cigarettes smell behind. The ashes do get the top very dirty so you should clean it off every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: had same one back home and really easy to clean, sturdiness and good
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things clean
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for smoking cigsrs.out on my decks. Using s regular type ash tray allowed tte ashes to blow sll over the place with the slightest of breezes.One push of the plunger quickly dumps them into the base snd keeps things clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Dearborn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: matched the man cave perfectly and keeps all the butts hidden instead of piling up in an open ashtray
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Great for "Cigarette" ash, PHENOMENAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Lemme just say FIVE STARS! Phenomenal. Exceeds expectations. It spins so fast it levitates. There must be a BLACK HOLE in this thing cause my "cigarette" ash is cosmically attracted to the depths of its vessel.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: POORLY DESIGNED AND MADE
customer_reviews.text: The spring mechanism came apart after one week rendering the ashtray useless for extinguishing cigarettes and preventing hot ashes from blowing in the wind. This is the second one I’ve had that did this. It’s not worth the hassle of tracking down and returning an $8 item. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor ashtray. I been looking for something like this ashtray and I found it in amazon . Is very light weight easy to use no open ashtray so the wind can blow all ashes all over the table , no smell . Great ashtray .
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Just a piece of trash!
customer_reviews.text: The product comes damaged, goes to trash . Very poor quality, disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Perdita

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to use outside in the Lanai and he is really happy with it and he is pretty picky. It's much larger than I expected but that's a good thing according to my husband. Seems well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. MccAin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray for the patio! Spray a bit of lubricant on gear and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Frances B

customer_reviews.title: Look good, work great
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the back of my boat. No smell, no ashes or butts blowing around
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It works as it is supposed to. Being brand ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as it is supposed to. Being brand new what more could I expect? If it doesn't pass the time test I will let you know. But what should one expect for such a decent price?
customer_reviews.author: independant snob

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: My house guests can only smoke outside. The best feature for me is that the ashtray is waterproof, because of the cover. One push and the cigs and ashes disappear. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: iredell

customer_reviews.title: Merry-Go-Round for Cigarettes
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and easy to use. You don't even have to put out your cigarette -- just lay it on top and spin it into the bottom. Helps cut back on the smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I like it but if you leave it outside make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I bought in a few months. I like it but if you leave it outside make sure it does not get wet because the mechanism breaks down when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: sherry shams

customer_reviews.title: Rust central. Product can’t sit in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Loved this ash tray. Was clean and worked perfectly. We leave it on our patio. We live in Florida and it’s rainy season. Unfortunately after two or three storms it rusted automatically. Disappointed. It doesn’t make move properly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our deck. The ashes stay down inside so not blowing around or getting rained on and messy. Easy to use and clean. I ended up buying 2 more for the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price just buy 10 and throw them away as they start to get yucky
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Larsen

customer_reviews.title: it was great. Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars if they could settle on a design. First time I bought one, it was great. Lasted a year. Second time, I got a smaller size for some reason. Third time, they used a new design that was inferior to the first, and it stopped working in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged and deformed . Do not buy this please .
customer_reviews.author: Angelitico

customer_reviews.title: Good Ashtray - Throwback look
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these. One for my house, for smokers who come over. One for one of those smokers who really liked it. It keeps the ashes and butts out of sight and also keeps the ashtray smell at bay. Good sturdy ashtray !
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good product and its size.
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray. The design lets all the cigarette stubs stay inside. It is fairly large and it is very easy to use and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksander Akselrod

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not securely stay on top. I have to pick up the whole ashtray from bottom part, to prevent lid from coming off, then dropping and spilling ashtray. Previous similar ones have a locking mechanism where you attach lid, turn it, and it securely stays affixed to bottom. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sandra barrientos

customer_reviews.title: No longer available
customer_reviews.text: Similar to German ashtrays, but lacked quality manufacturing. Base or bowl was warped. Functions well as a smokeless ashtray
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ashtray of destiny
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, keeps your asje neat and clean and also deals the smell away which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it is supposed to spin when you push the handle down and remove the ashes off the lid. Well mine doesn’t twirl anymore. It worked for about a week and then it just stopped. Needless to say I won’t be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Williams

customer_reviews.title: nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: back in the day, there was one of these on every table of any restaurant/bar you walked into, this one brought back memories, works great and keeps nearly all the smoke odor inside, i'd buy it again
customer_reviews.author: eebil

customer_reviews.title: Really Neat
customer_reviews.text: Really neat functional ash tray. We even use for cone incense.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin lords

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the sound!
customer_reviews.text: Nice retro gift for the smoking dad in your house!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wore out and broke after one month was good for the price but does not last long . Bought two and after about a month they kept getting stuck and not closing. Tried cleaning and washing to no avail
customer_reviews.author: J nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Appealing and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This little ashtray is so awesome! It works perfectly and is not an eyesore. I get a kick out of making the tray spin.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old style ashtrays
customer_reviews.text: Nice ashtray for my mom. Just like the old style ashtrays. The push down button on the one I got was bent and had to be fixed but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: L Walls

customer_reviews.title: Works well but tray could be deeper so cigarette doesn't roll out
customer_reviews.text: Works good and suits it's purpose but the well where you rest your cigarette could be deeper. The cigarette has a habit of rolling out if your not paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It spins
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty cool. I like it and my dad keeps trying to take it! So good product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: dO NOT SMOKE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT SMOK , IT IS A GIFT, LOOKS GOOD
customer_reviews.author: robert long

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: I went over to a friend of mine and noticed this ashtray on her table and immediately asked her where she got it. After using it I knew I had to have one. Shipping was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Downs

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off lid for emptying and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works well, only problem is rust on turn bolt after being outside in covered area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally cool ash tray
customer_reviews.text: We live this ash tray we have it out in our garden and it works great and keeps the table tidy
customer_reviews.author: Beverly West

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, functions well ,thick metal. Only complaint is that there's not much room for Ash in the top tray before you push the button down
customer_reviews.author: AGFarm

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy metal bends easily
customer_reviews.text: Like the design, though it could stand to be a wider diameter. Unfortunately, the build quality of the metal support piece is so shoddy that it bent under moderate pressure during normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Arren

customer_reviews.title: Spring action  rotating  lid ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time Spring action keeps butts easily inside A Favorite GIFT for us to give all of our smoking friends heavy enough to stay on tables during wind Easy to empty
customer_reviews.author: Caryn and John Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great Ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I love the size! Smooth sailing with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the patio!
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Sturdy product. Great for the patio. Bought them for my neighbors who leave their butts on the ground! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: No mass, nice look
customer_reviews.text: Good product, keeps bad smell from the cigaretts inside, look nice, no mass, very convenient. Recommending
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This broke within 2 weeks. I placed this on my patio. It filled with rain water one day and I guess rusted some. But the top fell apart pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TracyDub

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray. Works well and looks good on the patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine A. Runk

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: The product works as promised. It came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The top does not come back up after spinning down.
customer_reviews.author: robert wegner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice keeps the ashes from blowing around outside wish it was deeper
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, large capacity and spins clean(No wobble) . All in all I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: dan stevens

customer_reviews.title: easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I use them outside patio stays clean and pleasing to look at
customer_reviews.author: James Burt

customer_reviews.title: the top does not stay attached when you pick it up
customer_reviews.text: The size and durability seem fine but when you pick it up by the top handle it can spill all the contents. I had another similar and the top screws on.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Maples

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the ashtray! The price was good. I bought it as a piece of art.

product_meta.title: Mantello Round Push Down Cigarette Ashtray with Spinning Tray, Large, Black
product_meta.description: The Mantello Round Push Down Cigarette Ashtray is made of Metal and all you need to do is push the top plunger and the top tray spins and self cleans by throwing all the ashes into the hopper. Great conversion piece. Retro design, Scroll up to purchase now Enjoy you smoke.
feature_bullets: Use for home, office, patio, restaurant etc.
Push the top plunger and the top tray spins
